data.text:
***7 Live Vacancies*** Seven Executive is presently looking to fill a number of retained assignments both in the UK and USA. Should any of my network be open or looking for a new role or even know someone looking please do get in contact with any of the team. All clients ideally would like January starts for the successful applicants. See 7 live vacancies below. https://lnkd.in/ebNRdskw 1. Regional Sales Manager - New York City working for a global HVAC manufacturer. 2. Regional Sales Manager - Mid-Atlantic region working for a global HVAC manufacturer. 3. USA Business Development Manager - Data Center Industry. 4. Service Seller - New York City working for a global HVAC manufacturer. 5. UK Key Account Manager - Refrigeration Manufacturer. 6. UK Managing Director - Building Products Manufacturer. 7. National Service Sales Manager - Facilities Management Company. Seven Executive also works within the packaging and medical devices industry so if you know anyone also open or looking who works in these sectors we will have opportunities in these industries in Europe and the USA. #hvaclife #hvac #medicaldevices #packaging #packagingsolutions #sales #managingdirector #regionalsalesmanager #usajobs #usa #ukjobs #ukconstruction #facilitiesmanagement #network Sayham Choudhury Amelia P.

The Minneapolis/St. Paul Business Journal (MSPBJ) has named John Reutter, vice president, Finance, Uponor North America, as one of its 2022 CFO of the Year honorees. This annual award recognizes outstanding financial executives in the Twin Cities, and it is the first time Reutter has been named an honoree. “We are so proud to celebrate this honor with John,” noted Andres Caballero, president, Uponor North America. “His countless contributions to the growth and financial stability of our business, as well as stepping up to serve as interim president, is indicative of the high-caliber executive he is. On behalf of everyone at Uponor, we whole-heartedly agree with the decision to honor John in this way and feel privileged to work alongside him.” Reutter was recognized for his leadership in defining and executing the company’s strategic financial approach, especially during the challenges of the past couple of years. Since joining Uponor in 2018, he has led all financial decisions for the company’s North American operations and instituted a disciplined investment strategy, reorganized the Finance team, introduced new technology and processes, and collaborated across functions to positively accelerate operating profits from just over $50 million in 2018 to $100 million in 2021, a first in the company’s history.
